name: KNIFE/BIRD
description:
KNIFE/BIRD is a traversal based puzzle game where you must transform from a knife to a bird in order to complete a series of levels.

The game in its current state is just a test room to move around in and test the features created for it. This build consists of the ability to transform, break boxes as a knife, and collect bird seed.

No further development of this game is planned at this time.

Controls: keyboard required

Left arrow key: Turns bird counter-clockwise

Right arrow key: Turns bird clockwise

Down arrow key: Transforms between knife and bird

Up arrow key: Resets the level

Features:

  • Single test room
  • Transform between knife and bird
  • Collect bird seed
  • Breakable boxes (knife only)
Minimum Specs:
OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1,10
CPU: 0.5 GHz
RAM: 512 MB
Graphics: 128 MB
Resolution:1200 x 675
Recommended Specs:
anything greater than the specs listed above.Credits:
Camden Spiewak - Programer
Charles Probeck - Programer
Michael Spencer - Artist

Contact: CharlesProbeck@gmail.com
